comments:
clicked on run--> debug and i tried to create a new configuration for jboss 
4.x and i get an internal error, by checking the error log view, i got this 
message:
Problem occured when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.jface"
Is there any more information in the .log file? a stack trace perhaps?

It looks like a problem for "org.jboss.ide" - they are using internal code 
from our plug-in that no longer exists (or you don't have the right versions 
to work together). I suggest to file the bug report with them.

What is the right version for jboss server and jboss idk that goes with 
eclipse 3.1 on RHEL 3, please?
You need to ask the providers of those plug-ins. I have no clue :-)
